name: create_profile
body: let profile = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
profile . owner = ctx . accounts . user . key () ;

name: update_profile
body: let profile = & mut ctx . accounts . profile ;
require ! (profile . owner == ctx . accounts . user . key () , ErrorCode :: Unauthorized) ;

fields.name: profile
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 新規作成：init 制約で再初期化（Reinit Attack）を防止"] # [account (init , payer = user , space = 8 + 32 + 32)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このトランザクションを署名しているユーザー"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: profile
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 既存の Profile アカウント（Account<> による Owner Check／Type Cosplay）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 実際に署名したユーザー（Signer Authorization + Account Matching）"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このプロファイルを操作できるユーザー"]
